BEFORE:
x = torch.unsqueeze(x,1)

        x = self.conv_1(x)
        x = self.conv_2(x)
        x = self.dropout(x)

        x = self.conv_3(x)
        x = self.conv_4(x)
        x = self.dropout(x)

        x = self.conv_classifier(x)
        return x.squeeze()
AFTER:

        x = torch.flatten(x, start_dim=1)
        x = self.fc(x)
        return x
